# image

**Instance Property**

The action’s image.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var image: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The image appears next to the action’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAction/title]. Only the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuSystem/context] menu system supports the display of an image, and only when the app is running in iOS.

## Getting information about the action

- **title**: The action’s title.
- **identifier**: The unique identifier for the action.
- **discoverabilityTitle**: An elaborated title that explains the purpose of the action.
- **attributes**: The attributes indicating the style of the action.
- **state**: The state of the action.
- **sender**: The object responsible for the action handler.
